page.title: 07LOCAL GOVERNMENT
page.content: Great Wenham and Raydon are in the Babergh District of Suffolk county council which has its H.Q. at Hadleigh. Great Wenham has a parish meeting held whenever necessary,usually to deal with planning applications.Raydon has a parish council which meet regularly. GREEN GODDESSES.This is the colloquial term given to the auxiliary fire service engines which were made in the 1950's to a standard design in the era of an active civil defence organisation They were painted the standard civil defence green and were each equipped with a simple extending ladder, a small water carrying capacity and the usual hoses.They are now stored and maintained by the fire service department of the Home Office in the event of a national emergency.The local storage depot is in one of the hangars on Raydon
